Description: Global Orchestration: A newer player (founded ~2022) that acts as a single API to 100+ local KYC providers.
Modular Compliance: Often cited in 2026 as the best "all-rounder" for mid-sized banks that need to stay within budget.

Identity Decisioning Platform: An orchestration layer that connects 200+ data sources to automate onboarding and fraud checks.; Identity Decisioning: The industry's most popular "orchestration" layer connecting 200+ data sources. *Most popular US orchestration hub.*

ID Verification: Specialized in AI-enhanced risk management tailored for the Middle East and African identity document types.; IDV & KYC: Specialized in Arabic document OCR and local government database integrations in the GCC.

Compliance AI Agent: A specialized AI tool that filters PEP and Adverse Media matches to provide "explainable" true positives, reducing manual review time.
Focuses on "Network Risk," identifying if a ship is owned by a sanctioned entity or has historically loitered in high-risk territorial waters.

24/7 Monitoring: A modular AML/CFT suite specifically designed for FinTechs and "Electronic Money Institutions" (EMIs).; Fintech-First AML: Specifically built for Electronic Money Institutions (EMIs) to meet strict European central bank rules.

e-ID Aggregator: A niche startup that aggregates "digital IDs" (like BankID or Government e-IDs) into one API, bypassing physical document scans.; e-ID Aggregator: Bypasses document scans by connecting directly to digital IDs (BankID, govt wallets) for 100% verified data. *e-ID aggregation (bypassing document scans).*

Avallone Platform: A "360-degree" KYC/KYB ecosystem. It features KYC Collector (for outreach) and KYC Responder (for answering bank queries). Known for its AI Answer Engine and dynamic UBO visualization. *Complex UBO mapping and bank responder.*
Videris Automate: An OSINT-led screening platform that visualizes hidden connections across corporate records, social media, and the dark web.

While Bloomberg is famous for the "Terminal," their alignment with your database—specifically for AFC (Anti-Financial Crime)—comes from their Enterprise Data division, which focuses on "sanctions on securities" and "complex corporate ownership."
Provides high-fidelity Sanctioned Securities data and UBO (Ultimate Beneficial Ownership) mapping for over 4 million legal entities. Specializes in "look-through" analysis for 410,000+ mutual funds and ETFs to identify sanctioned constituents.
Global Risk Data Platform: Specializes in "clean" sanctions data and transaction screening with a focus on reducing false positives via AI automation. *"Clean" automated sanctions data.*
Reactor/KYT: The leading forensic and compliance tool for blockchain transactions.
ComplyData: AI-driven real-time screening and transaction monitoring.
iKYC Screening: Provides real-time AML/KYC screening against 240+ countries. Known for its "Risk Assessment Engine" that automates client risk ratings.
Convier Intelligence: An investigations-first platform that connects internal customer data with external sources to uncover complex networks. Excels at "Network Risk" for institutional clients.
GRC Orchestrator: A flexible Governance, Risk, and Compliance platform. Acts as the "Glue" for non-financial risks, integrating AML/KYC workflows into a broader enterprise risk framework.
RiskCenter: Editorial-quality adverse media and sanction data feeds.
D&B Compliance Intelligence: Uses the "Data Cloud" (500m+ entities) to automate KYB, beneficial ownership, and ESG/Cyber risk screening.

Region: Global (Market leader in MENA and Europe)
Description: A global provider of compliance and payment solutions. Its flagship suite, SafeWatch, is a leading real-time screening engine for sanctions and AML. It is particularly known for its deep integration with SWIFT payment rails and its focus on financial messaging security.
Facctum Sentinel: A cloud-native sanctions screening tool built for low-latency, real-time payment environments.

ARIC™ Risk Hub: The global leader in "Adaptive Behavioral Analytics." It creates a unique "behavioral profile" for every customer to detect fraud and money laundering in real-time before the transaction settles.
RiskOps Platform: A leader in "Fusion Risk," combining transaction monitoring and screening with behavioral biometrics to stop scams in real-time.
Lifecycle Mgmt | CLM Platform: Specialized in the heavy documentation required for Corporate/Institutional banking KYC.
Falcon Fraud Manager: The industry leader in credit/debit card fraud detection.; Card Fraud | Falcon Fraud Manager: Protects over 2.5 billion payment cards globally from real-time fraud.
AML Compliance Manager: Integrated risk and screening for retail banking and wealth.
AML Risk Manager: Behavioral monitoring and risk scoring for mid-to-large institutions.

Real-time AML: A startup known for its ultra-fast integration (often under 1 week) for transaction monitoring and risk scoring.; No-Code AML: Known for a "10-minute integration" for startups needing instant transaction monitoring and risk scoring.
Focal AML: An AI suite dominant in Saudi Arabia for name matching and real-time watchlist screening. *Native Arabic NLP and GCC database access.*
Dynamic Ocean: Best-in-class predictive ETAs and integrated "Yard Management" to track containers once they hit the terminal.

Description: A collaborative industry platform (ROSE) that standardizes sanctions screening. Focuses on reducing friction in cross-border payments through a shared utility model.

A modern compliance CRM and orchestration platform. Its "Hummingbird AI" suite uses generative models to automate SAR (Suspicious Activity Report) narratives, summarize complex investigative notes, and centralize data from screening engines and transaction monitoring tools into a single "Golden Case."

Jet-engine for screening. API-first, 'headless' screening engine designed for high-frequency trading and instant payments. Focuses on performance and scalability. *High-performance API for instant payments.*

AI-powered payments and compliance solutions. Specializes in financial messaging (SWIFT/ISO 20022) and real-time fraud/sanctions screening.

Automate the "Know Your Vessel" (KYV) process for financial institutions, insurers, and flag states.

Description: Decision Intelligence: Uses entity resolution to find hidden money-laundering networks. *Contextual intelligence for complex networks.*

Screening Lite: A lightweight, cost-effective tool aimed at SMEs for Sanctions, PEP, and Adverse Media screening.
